name: Test Bench Control
description: A test bench control system for testing hardware.
long_description:
The system is designed to control a test bench that is used to test hardware.
The system is designed to have concurrency tasks with different priorities.
In detail:
Task 1 : execution of CAN messages cycle (max priority)
Task 2 : control of Device Under Test (DUT) status
Task 3 : control of support devices status
Task 4 : control of environment status
Task 5 : refresh of touchscreen display

name: Hardware in the Loop bench
description: A custom test bench control system for testing software.
long_description:
The system is designed to control a test bench that is used to test hardware.
The system is designed to have concurrency parallel tasks.
Some explaination:
Send and receive CAN message functions have one free core to be processed
Checking digital and analog signal status functions has one free process to be executed
User interface to execute test and change inputs has one free process to be executed

name: My personal website V1.0
long_description: This is my first personal website. It is a static website with some information about me and my projects.

name: FootLab AS
description: A website for a football club that organize a tournament.
long_description: This is a website for a football club that organize a tournament. The website has a registration form for the tournament and a page with the tournament schedule.

name: ReadSpace srl
description: A website for a company that offers a service of sharing reviews of books.
long_description: This is a website for a company that offers a service of sharing reviews of books. The website has a registration form for the users and a page with the reviews of the books.

name: Vision System for industrial robot
description: A vision system for an industrial robot to perform pick and place operations.
long_description: A vision system for an industrial robot to perform pick and place operations. The system is designed to detect the object to be picked and the position where the object has to be placed. Then move the robot to pick the object and place it in the desired position.

name: Domotic House Control
description: A domotic system to control the house.
long_description: A domotic system to control the house. The system is designed to control the lights, the windows, the heating system, the air conditioning system, the mailbox for doorbell

name: Automatic Production Line with Robot
description: An automatic production line with industrial robots.
long_description: An automatic production line with industrial robots. The system is designed to move the objects from one station to another station. The system is designed to have multiple robots that perform operation on product and picks the object from the conveyor belt and place it in the desired position.

name: Automation machine for ceramic tiles
description: An automatic machine for regulating the tiles painting.
long_description: An automatic machine for regulating the tiles painting. The system is designed to regulate the flux of painting on the tiles. The system is designed to have multiple sensors that detect the position of the tiles and the chosen pattern to apply. The system check if there is an operator in proximity of the machine and stop working if there is a danger condition.
